body_html: Hey Doug, your code sample is very hard to read. It looks like a bunch of the line breaks were lost somehow. I think replying by email is screwing up github, would you mind opening the issue and repasting in your code + error into a comment directly? You can use the "<>" button above the comment edit box to insert a code block. Thanks!

body: Hey Doug, your code sample is very hard to read. It looks like a bunch of the line breaks were lost somehow. I think replying by email is screwing up github, would you mind opening the issue and repasting in your code + error into a comment directly? You can use the "<>" button above the comment edit box to insert a code block. Thanks!
